mainText:
Dear Steve,

You changed the way our generation used technology. You were a true innovator and an engineer in so many ways. You brought us inventions that brought ease into our lives. Inspiration flowed through your veins and reached out to us. Thanks for the iPhone, iTouch, and MacBook Pro that I am using this day! Thank you so much, Steve! I know God has a seat for you up there in Heaven. Rest in peace, Steve!
author: Viet
